definition

Class Inputs

  • java.lang.Object
    • definition.Inputs

  • public class Inputs
extends java.lang.Object

    Input Class

    Class stores all the information of the delivery and pickup Restaurant locations for all the orders Class also has preparation time and delivery time stored In the current version, There is only Max Delivery time at customer End, and Min Preparation time at Restaurant However same formulation can be used to add Max Pick-up time at Restaurant, and Min Delivery time at Customer End
    Version:
    20170822
    Author:
    Ritesh Agrawal

      • getDeliveryTime

        public int getDeliveryTime(Node n)
        Method to get Maximum Delivery time for Node n. In current version, there is no Maximum Delivery Time for Pick-up nodes However this can be easily added here
        Parameters:
        n - Node for which Maximum Delivery Time is required
        Returns:
        Maximum Delivery time required
        See Also:

      • getprepTime

        public int getprepTime(Node n)
        Method to get Preparation time, i.e. Minimum Time for Node n. In current version, there is no Minimum Delivery Time for Delivery nodes However this can be easily added here - Customer Not At Home
        Parameters:
        n - Node for which Preparation Time is required
        Returns:
        Preparation time required
        See Also:
        Node
